title: In Search Of: 1887-88 Old Judge N172 Bill Greenwood
author: Wheatcroft

posts.post_title: In Search Of: 1887-88 Old Judge N172 Bill Greenwood
posts.post_content:
In search of 1887-88 Old Judge N172 Bill Greenwood card.

Looking for this card. Bill Greenwood is a relative of mine. I missed out on an auction on 10/21. If any one has one for sale or can point me in the direction it will be greatly appreciated. 

Thanksall.
